MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 11-JAN-2021 14:05.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the CH42 postcode area of Birkenhead affecting properties in Church Road, Town Road and surrounding area.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  11:10AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:15PM, We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:27PM on 11th January 2021.
